com.atakmap.android.toolbars

Class RangeCircleButtonTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.toolbar.Tool
      • com.atakmap.android.drawing.tools.CircleCreationTool
        • com.atakmap.android.tools.RangeCircleCreationTool
          • com.atakmap.android.toolbars.RangeCircleButtonTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnKeyListener, android.view.View.OnLongClickListener, MapEventDispatcher.MapEventDispatchListener

    public class RangeCircleButtonTool
extends RangeCircleCreationTool
implements android.view.View.OnLongClickListener, android.view.View.OnClickListener
    Button Tool to place a RangeCircle in the Range & Bearing Group (direct child of Root Group). The user workflow follows that of the R&B Arrow Tool. If the user long presses the user marker will automatically be followed as the center point. Also if selecting a PointMapItem the center or radius will follow that PointMapItem's center point.

    Heavily modified this class with the circle refactor. Most functionality shifted to other classes. AS.

        protected void setActive(boolean active)
        Description copied from class: Tool
        Called to set whether a tool is actively being used. Generally, this should be automatically handled by the onToolBegin(), onToolEnd() life cycle. Override to update GUI elements to reflect the new value.
